com.jidesoft.grid
Class TableModelWrapperUtils

java.lang.Object
  com.jidesoft.grid.TableModelWrapperUtils
public class TableModelWrapperUtils
extends java.lang.Object

TableWrapperUtilsis a utility class that contains several useful methods for TableModelWrapper.

Note: This class is part of HierarchicalTable component. In current release, HierarchicalTable is still in beta. Please feel free to try it, give us suggestions and feedbacks. However we reserve the right to change the public APIs if it's necessary.

getActualRowAt

public static int getActualRowAt(javax.swing.table.TableModel outerModel,
                                 int row,
                                 java.lang.Class innerModelClass)
Gets the actual row index at a outerModel whose class is innerModelClass.

Parameters:
outerModel - the outermost outerModel.
row - the row of outermost outerModel
innerModelClass - the class of the inner outerModel
Returns:
the row index of inner outerModel. If it can't find it, -1 will be returned.
